testsuite.name: switch_between_basemaps.Check the availability of different basemaps in Basemap Panel

testcase.classname: switch_between_basemaps.Check the availability of different basemaps in Basemap Panel
testcase.name: Change basemap to streetmap basemap
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Change basemap to streetmap basemap Given user visit the Basemap Panel ... passed in 14.788s When select streetmap basemap from the Basemap Panel ... passed in 1.128s Then user will see that existing basemap will change to streetmap basemap ... passed in 1.078s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: switch_between_basemaps.Check the availability of different basemaps in Basemap Panel
testcase.name: User will change basemap from streetmap to lightcanvas basemap
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User will change basemap from streetmap to lightcanvas basemap Given Basemap panel is open for the user ... passed in 1.022s When select lightcanvas basemap from the Basemap Panel ... passed in 1.194s Then user will see that existing basemap will change to lightcanvas basemap ... passed in 0.060s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: switch_between_basemaps.Check the availability of different basemaps in Basemap Panel
testcase.name: User will change basemap from lightcanvas to darkgraycanvas basemap
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User will change basemap from lightcanvas to darkgraycanvas basemap When select darkgraycanvas basemap from the Basemap Panel ... passed in 1.112s Then user will see that existing basemap will change to darkgraycanvas basemap ... passed in 0.083s Then user will close the Basemap panel ... passed in 1.138s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
